Container.Name: PatreonCredits
Container.Overview: Generate professional scrolling end-credits videos (MP4) for YouTube content creators, featuring their Patreon supporters. Fetch patrons directly from the Patreon API or paste custom names. Supports 35 bundled fonts with CJK character support, 1-5 column layouts, 720p/1080p/4K resolution, and fully customizable colors, sizes, and styling. Includes a web-based UI, REST API, and Swagger docs.
Container.Description: Patreon Credits Generator creates scrolling end-credits videos for YouTube creators. Connect your Patreon account to automatically fetch supporter names, or paste names manually. Configure fonts, colors, column layouts, header text, and resolution (720p/1080p/4K) through the web UI. Videos are rendered as MP4 using FFmpeg (bundled in the container). Also includes a REST API with Swagger documentation and an Adobe Premiere Pro plugin for direct timeline integration.

Config.Name: Output Directory
Config.Description: Directory where generated videos are saved.

Config.Name: Patreon Token
Config.Description: Patreon Creator Access Token. Leave empty to configure in the web UI or use dummy data.

Config.Name: Campaign ID
Config.Description: Patreon Campaign ID. Leave empty to configure in the web UI.

Config.Name: Use Dummy Data
Config.Description: Use dummy patron names for testing without Patreon credentials.
